specification.name: Scott Encoding Operations
specification.description: Scott encoding operations for edge case handling using lambda calculus data structures.

mathematical_foundations.scott_encoding: Encode data structures as lambda terms with O(1) pattern matching
mathematical_foundations.natural_numbers: zero = λz s. z, succ(n) = λz s. s n
mathematical_foundations.lists: nil = λn c. n, cons(h,t) = λn c. c h t
mathematical_foundations.trees: leaf(x) = λl n. l x, node(l,r) = λl n. n l r

operations.name: Scott Encode Natural Number
operations.formula: encode(n) = λz s. s (s ... (s z)...) [n times]

operations.name: Scott Pattern Matching
operations.description: O(1) pattern matching on Scott-encoded structures
